newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai central bank injects 7 bln baht into system.
newsitem.headline: Thai central bank injects 7 bln baht into system.

text.p: Bank of Thailand governor Rerngchai Marakanond said on Wednesday the bank had injected seven billion baht into the system today to ease tight liquidity.
The BOT had injected funds amounting to 15 billion baht on Tuesday, Rerngchai told reporters.
Tight money supply over the past few days stemmed from the bimonthly corporate tax payment and commercial banks' holding back funds for the coming BOT reserve requirement, he said.
Commercial banks sold $30 million to the BOT on Wednesday compared to sales of $70 million on Tuesday, the governor said.
